objects.name: National Cyber Security Centre (NCSC)
objects.description: Primary author and publisher of the report, provided YARA rules and analysis of AUTHENTIC ANTICS.

objects.name: Outlook Logging Locale refresh_token storage
objects.description: Used by AUTHENTIC ANTICS to cache the most recently stolen OAuth 2.0 refresh_token for reuse and validation.

objects.name: Outlook Logging Counter execution timer
objects.description: Abused by AUTHENTIC ANTICS to throttle stealer execution (earliest next run time set every 6 days). Not a legitimate value.

objects.name: Office Identity enumeration key
objects.description: Enumerated by AUTHENTIC ANTICS to select the most recently used Office account and extract EmailAddress and PreferredUsername for targeting.

objects.name: MachineGuid source for environmental keying
objects.description: Queried by AUTHENTIC ANTICS to obtain MachineGuid; XORed with C: volume serial to derive AES-256 decryption key for the embedded stealer payload.

objects.name: COM hijack persistence key (npmproxy.dll)
objects.description: Persistence via COM hijacking; the value is set to load Microsoft.Identity64.dll instead of the legitimate npmproxy.dll during Outlook startup.

objects.name: Connectivity check URL
objects.description: Used by AUTHENTIC ANTICS to verify outbound network connectivity before executing the stealer stage.

objects.name: Microsoft OAuth 2.0 authorize endpoint
objects.description: Driven by AUTHENTIC ANTICS-controlled browser to elicit login and intercept authorization codes, credentials, and tokens.

objects.name: Microsoft OAuth 2.0 token endpoint
objects.description: Contacted by AUTHENTIC ANTICS to redeem authorization codes or refresh tokens for OAuth 2.0 access/refresh tokens.

objects.name: Outlook API exfiltration endpoint (Office365)
objects.description: Abused by AUTHENTIC ANTICS to send exfiltrated credentials/tokens from the victim account to an actor-controlled email, with SaveToSentItems=false.

objects.name: Outlook API exfiltration endpoint (Office.com)
objects.description: Alternate Outlook API endpoint used by AUTHENTIC ANTICS for email-based exfiltration via the victim account.

objects.name: Windows authentication broker redirect URI
objects.description: Redirect URI used in the OAuth flow; intercepted by AUTHENTIC ANTICS via a Navigating handler to capture authorization codes and credentials.

objects.name: Microsoft OAuth service domain
objects.description: Legitimate Microsoft domain contacted by AUTHENTIC ANTICS to perform malicious token theft operations.

objects.name: Outlook API domain (Office365)
objects.description: Legitimate Microsoft domain abused by AUTHENTIC ANTICS for exfiltration via the Outlook API.

objects.name: Outlook API domain (Office.com)
objects.description: Legitimate Microsoft domain abused by AUTHENTIC ANTICS for exfiltration via the Outlook API.

objects.name: Connectivity check domain
objects.description: Legitimate Google domain used by AUTHENTIC ANTICS to check for network connectivity prior to execution.

objects.name: Dropper PDB build path
objects.description: PDB path string observed in AUTHENTIC ANTICS dropper; useful for hunting developer build artifacts and clustering samples.

objects.name: authentic antics
objects.description: AUTHENTIC ANTICS is a Windows-targeting malware that runs within the Outlook process to display malicious login prompts and intercept OAuth 2.0 authorization codes, credentials, and tokens. It uses a mixed-mode dropper (Microsoft.Identity64.dll) with extensive defense evasion including string obfuscation, environmental keying, and ntdll.dll unhooking to decrypt and load a .NET stealer payload (Microsoft.Identity.Client.dll). The stealer generates Outlook login prompts, intercepts authorization codes and credentials via a Navigating event handler, redeems access/refresh tokens from Microsoft’s Authorization Server, and exfiltrates data by sending emails from the victim’s account via Outlook’s web API with SaveToSentItems=false. It employs COM hijacking for persistence, communicates only with legitimate services, and includes MSAL code to appear legitimate.

objects.name: NCC Group
objects.description: Acknowledged for providing AUTHENTIC ANTICS samples referenced in the report.

objects.name: Microsoft
objects.description: Provider of Outlook, Microsoft OAuth 2.0 Authorization services, and libraries (MSAL/ADAL) that AUTHENTIC ANTICS abuses for authentication and exfiltration.

objects.name: Google
objects.description: Host of the legitimate connectivity check URL (http://www.gstatic.com/generate_204) used by AUTHENTIC ANTICS.

objects.name: AUTHENTIC_ANTICS_obfuscated_stack_strings
objects.description: YARA rule to detect related activity.
objects.pattern:
rule AUTHENTIC_ANTICS_obfuscated_stack_strings {
    meta:
        author = "NCSC"
        description = "This rule detects patterns in how the AUTHENTIC ANTICS dropper
builds strings on the stack."

    strings:
        $stack_string_1 = {8D 50 ?? 8D 48 ?? 8D 78 ?? 8D 42 ?? 44 8D 42 ?? 44 8D 62 ??
44 8D 52 ?? 44 8D 6A } // build obfuscated stack string
        $stack_string_2 = {8D 73 ?? 44 8D 4B ?? 44 8D 53 ?? 44 8D 5B ?? 44 8D 73 ?? 44
8D 7B ??}
        $stack_string_3 = {41 8D 49 ?? 8D 51 ?? 45 8D 41 ?? 45 8D 51 ?? 45 8D 59}

    condition:

    uint16(0) == 0x5A4D and uint32(uint32(0x3C)) == 0x00004550 and all of them

}

objects.name: AUTHENTIC_ANTICS_ntdll_unhooking
objects.description: YARA rule to detect related activity.
objects.pattern:
rule AUTHENTIC_ANTICS_ntdll_unhooking {
    meta:
        author = "NCSC"
        description = "This rule detects code used in the unhooking of ntdll functions
in the AUTHENTIC ANTICS dropper."

    strings:
        $addr_calc = {48 8B D0 49 2B D4 8B D2 49 03 D6 48 8B 00 48 3B 02} // ntdll
function unhooking calculation logic

    condition:
        uint16(0) == 0x5A4D and uint32(uint32(0x3C)) == 0x00004550 and all of them

}

objects.name: AUTHENTIC_ANTICS_pdb_and_imports
objects.description: YARA rule to detect related activity.
objects.pattern:
import "pe"

rule AUTHENTIC_ANTICS_pdb_and_imports {
    meta:
        author = "NCSC"
        description = "This rule detects the pdb path and imports associated with the
AUTHENTIC ANTICS dropper."

    strings:
        $pdb = "C:\\Users\\user\\Desktop\\outlook4\\bin\\"

    condition:
        uint16(0) == 0x5A4D and uint32(uint32(0x3C)) == 0x00004550 and all of them and
pe.imports("user32.dll","GetClassNameW") and pe.imports("user32.dll","GetParent") and
pe.imports("user32.dll","EnumChildWindows") and
pe.imports("user32.dll","GetWindowTextW") and
pe.imports("user32.dll","GetWindowThreadProcessId")
}

objects.name: AUTHENTIC_ANTICS_iertutil_hook
objects.description: YARA rule to detect related activity.

objects.name: AUTHENTIC_ANTICS_Stealer
objects.description: YARA rule to detect related activity.
objects.pattern:
rule AUTHENTIC_ANTICS_Stealer {
    meta:
        author = "NCSC"

 description = "This rule detects strings present in the AUTHENTIC ANTICS .NET

stealer payload."

    strings:
        $ = "http://www.gstatic.com/generate_204" wide
        $ = "d3590ed6-52b3-4102-aeff-aad2292ab01c" wide
        $ = "https://login.microsoftonline.com/common/oauth2/token" wide
        $ = "https://outlook.office365.com/api/v2.0/me/sendMail" wide
        $ =
"https://login.microsoftonline.com/common/oauth2/authorize?response_type=code+id_token&c
lient_id=d3590ed6-52b3-4102-aeff-aad2292ab01c&redirect_uri=ms-appx-
web%3a%2f%2fMicrosoft.AAD.BrokerPlugin%2fd3590ed6-52b3-4102-aeff-
aad2292ab01c&instance_aware=true&nonce=" wide

web://Microsoft.AAD.BrokerPlugin/d3590ed6-52b3-4102-aeff-aad2292ab01c" wide

$ = "<form method=\"POST\" name=\"hiddenform\" action=\"ms-appx-

    condition:
        (uint16(0) == 0x5A4D) and uint32(uint32(0x3C)) == 0x00004550 and all of them
}

objects.name: Event Triggered Execution: Component Object Model Hijacking
objects.description: AUTHENTIC ANTICS is persisted via COM Hijacking.

objects.name: Deobfuscate/Decode Files or Information
objects.description: AUTHENTIC ANTICS encrypts the stealer payload as well as using gzip and RSA to obfuscate exfiltration data.

objects.name: Impair Defenses: Disable or Modify Tools
objects.description: AUTHENTIC ANTICS unhooks registry APIs within ntdll.dll.

objects.name: Execution Guardrails: Environmental Keying
objects.description: The AUTHENTIC ANTICS stealer payload is encrypted with a key derived from victim device specific data.

objects.name: System Binary Proxy Execution
objects.description: AUTHENTIC ANTICS carries out extensive checks to ensure it is running from within the Outlook process.

objects.name: Adversary-in-the-Middle
objects.description: AUTHENTIC ANTICS intercepts requests to Microsoft’s OAuth 2.0 Authorization Server and extracts an authorisation code and credentials.

objects.name: Forced Authentication
objects.description: AUTHENTIC ANTICS directs a pop-up browser window to Microsoft’s OAuth 2.0 Authorization Server which prompts the victim to enter their credentials.

objects.name: Exfiltration Over Web Service
objects.description: AUTHENTIC ANTICS hijacks the victim’s email account to send an email to an actor email address via Outlook’s web API.

objects.name: Analisi Malware: Authentic Antics
objects.description: This report contains technical analysis and indicators associated with malware. authentic antics.
